translations: 难达到；难接近；无法理解

sentences.sentence: Defiant in their haughty and arrogant inaccessibility, they seem to shout: I dare you!
sentences.translation: 他们目中无人，高视阔步，似乎在叫喊：我敢说你！

sentences.sentence: But the inaccessibility of doctors makes early detection more difficult.
sentences.translation: 但是，看医生难让早发现更加困难。

sentences.sentence: Its inaccessibility made me want it all the more and I threw out the challenge that read the book I must and would.
sentences.translation: 越得不到，我就越想看看。我暗自较劲，必须要且一定要读到这本书。
